CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1957, pg. A9, reads: "METEOR MODELS - Talented dancers, Louse Lowery, left, and Wyetta Turner, pose with six of the atractive [sic] young models who were among the many participating in Meteor Club's smart fashion show at the Fort Pitt Hotel. Left to right: Kay Pope, Yvonne Jones, Helen (Toni) Holmes, Johanna Mobrey, and Barbara (BJ) Johnson, president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight women, with Louise Lowery and Wyetta Turner wearing tutu and ballet costumes posed on either end, and standing and modeling bathing suits, dresses, and wedding gowns, including: Kay Pope, Yvonne Jones (Kemp), Helen "Toni" Holmes, Johanna Mobrey, and Barbara "BJ" Johnson, for Meteor Club fashion show, Fort Pitt Hotel, another version
